item.title: Enabling HTTP Strict Transport Security HSTS via Web Config
item.description: In my previous post, I discussed how to enable HSTS via MVC Action Filters. I thought that I would just do a follow up post showing you how to enable it via the web.config.

item.title: Enabling HTTP Strict Transport Security HSTS via ASP Net MVC ActionFilters
item.description: After reading Troy Hunt’s free ebook on the OWASP Top 10 for .Net Developers, I discovered an additional mechanism to help developers secure their websites. That mechanism is HTTP Strict Transport Security.
